title: Software Engineer
description: Architected and implemented automated CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions, significantly accelerating software delivery cycles. Orchestrated containerized applications with Docker to ensure environment parity and high-availability deployments across hybrid-cloud infrastructures.

title: Software Engineer II
description: Developed robust, scalable backend services for cloud-native internal systems using Python and Django. Engineered complex 3rd party API integrations and optimized database performance with PostgreSQL to handle high-concurrency workloads.

title: CAO Systems Specialist
description: Managed enterprise-level SQL Server and Oracle databases supporting forecasting and inventory for 750+ retail locations. Leveraged Python to develop custom internal automation tools that remain critical to team operations today.

title: Shift Lead / Photo Specialist
description: Managed a team of three to merchandise products, manage store inventory, and order stock. Trained and supervised new associates and managers on store procedures and policies.
